backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature mapping file linking product features to frontend source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color tokens, theming, and print-friendly base rules.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app entry point with a root mount node.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing receipt form state, payments, preview, and PDF generation.
frontend/src/components/receipt/hooks/us: Manages logo state, allowing upload of a custom logo and resetting to a default image.
Generates and stores a receipt number, with a function to regenerate it.
Computes total payment amount and validity based on a list of payment entries.
frontend/src/components/receipt/LogoUplo: UI component enabling drag‑and‑drop or manual upload of custom company logos with reset support.
frontend/src/components/receipt/Payments: Editor component that renders and updates multiple payment entries including mode, amount, and UTR.
frontend/src/components/receipt/pdf/gene: Opens a print window and renders styled HTML to generate and print multiple receipt copies as PDF.
frontend/src/components/receipt/PrintPre: Modal displaying an A4 print preview and providing a button to trigger PDF generation.
frontend/src/components/receipt/PrintShe: Renders two stacked receipt previews with a cut‑here separator for A4 print layout.
frontend/src/components/receipt/ReceiptP: CSS stylesheet defining typography and layout for a clean, print‑optimized receipt preview.
Renders a full receipt preview with header, info, payment table, totals, and signature using provided data and logo.
frontend/src/components/receipt/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for payment entries and full receipt data.
frontend/src/components/receipt/utils/da: Provides helpers for formatting dates, getting today's date, and validating date strings.
frontend/src/components/receipt/utils/mo: Contains functions for parsing, validating, totaling, and formatting monetary amounts.
frontend/src/components/receipt/utils/re: Generates a unique receipt number using the current date and timestamp.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theming variables, and print-specific A4 layout styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, radius, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, goals, stack, and feature list for a fully client‑side A4 PDF receipt generator with two-copy layout and print/preview support.
